backend/main.mo: Actor defining user profiles, conversations, authorization checks, and blob storage integration for a chat system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking cooking-related features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app combining authentication, chat UI, conversation management, voice features, and export functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with retries and user‑friendly toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input component handling text, voice dictation, image attachments, and sending messages with modes. Manages previews, cleanup, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatEmptySt: Displays a welcoming empty state with example prompts and capability hints. Allows users to trigger prompts with one click.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Renders the chat message list with auto‑scrolling, role indicators, optional voice controls, and structured cooking-format parsing. Supports assistant and user messages with source and content formatting.
frontend/src/components/chat/types.ts: Defines types for chat messages, modes, and photo attachments. Used across chat components for consistent message structure.
frontend/src/components/help/Capabilitie: Dialog describing SuperNova’s capabilities and limitations in a scrollable layout. Shows feature lists with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/history/Conversa: Sidebar listing past conversations with selection, creation, and optional export. Handles authenticated vs unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/components/settings/VoiceSe: Dialog for choosing voice response mode with radio options and browser support warnings. Updates voice mode selection through callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversationHistor: Manages active conversation selection, creation, switching, and entry saving tied to user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInformationRetriev: Fetches and summarizes info from Wikipedia and DuckDuckGo, handling failures and cooking-specific formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for user profiles, conversations, and entries with react-query queries and mutations.
Implements browser speech-to-text recording with state management and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Provides text-to-speech playback controls with support checks and error handling.
Stores and updates the user's preferred voice response mode in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base and component layers plus extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/cooking.ts: Detects cooking prompts and formats cooking responses, including structured extraction and a cookie fallback recipe.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Provides a helper to download arbitrary data as a JSON file with a timestamped default filename.
frontend/src/utils/summarize.ts: Generates a short summary from text snippets by selecting leading sentences or truncating as needed.
frontend/src/utils/textCleanup.ts: Cleans and normalizes text by stripping HTML, removing boilerplate, deduplicating lines, and trimming to sentences.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, custom colors tied to CSS variables, and UI animations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing cooking-related features, and pending accessibility-focused feature requests.
